item.title: GitHub Pages with Hugo
item.description: This year (2022) I have put together major updates to two web sites. Liking Go, therefore Hugo was used to generate the static content site and GitHub Pages to host both of them. Namecheap.com is my domain registrar. I used two different methods to host and deploy them. METHOD 1 (TWO REPOSITORIES) A little background about the content of the first site Daoyin Chuan which uses the two repository method.
